timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              # Was: CATALOGCACHE_SZ 300 1.2M
          
          
            
              # Now: CATALOGCACHE_SZ 30000  1200M
          
          
            
              su - db2inst1 -c "db2 update db cfg for fhirdb using CATALOGCACHE_SZ 30000"
          
          
            
              # Was: CATALOGCACHE_SZ 300 1.2M
          
          
            
              # Now: CATALOGCACHE_SZ 30000  120M
          
          
            
              su - db2inst1 -c "db2 update db cfg for fhirdb using CATALOGCACHE_SZ 30000"
timeline.author: prb112
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -22,6 +22,10 @@ if [[ $(su - db2inst1 -c "db2 list db directory" | grep alias | grep FHIRDB | aw
   echo "FHIRDB exists - skipping create"
 else
   su - db2inst1 -c "db2 CREATE DB FHIRDB using codeset UTF-8 territory us PAGESIZE 32768"
+  # See https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSEPGG_11.1.0/com.ibm.db2.luw.admin.config.doc/doc/r0000338.html
+  # Was: CATALOGCACHE_SZ 300 1.2M
+  # Now: CATALOGCACHE_SZ 30000  1200M
+  su - db2inst1 -c "db2 update db cfg for fhirdb using CATALOGCACHE_SZ 30000"
